      • startBonding

        public boolean startBonding(BluetoothDevice device)
        This method starts bonding process, sometimes the PIN pop up message does not appear on screen, the user should find this message in android device notifications (slide down to show notifications from android device).
        Parameters:
        device - Device to start the bonding process
        Returns:
        Bonding operation status

      • writeCharacteristicQueue

        public boolean writeCharacteristicQueue(BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic,
                               byte[] data)
        Writes a custom byte array onto a characteristic, the callback is given onto public void onStartWriteCharacteristic(BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic, int status); from BluetoothManagerCharacteristicsCallback interface
        Parameters:
        characteristic - Characteristic where the user wants to write
        data - Byte array to write on MySignals
        Returns:
        Write operation result

      • writeCharacteristicSubscription

        public void writeCharacteristicSubscription(BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic,
                                   boolean subscribe)
        Writes notifications with concurrency, this method handles a queue with characteristics to notify.
        Parameters:
        characteristic - Characteristic to notify
        subscribe - Flag to subscribe/unsubscribe
